title: Why are people Tryharding in Normal games? Is there an Lp reward?
body:
Every game I play, people Ade using their mains and making queues of 3-5 people on their team. Why is winning so important? Is there an Lp reward at the end of the game? When do I get to farm under turret without a tryhard level 3 Lee sin diving me? 

Another thing is that there needs to be a normal queue for Solo/duo queue ONLY, so people can practice for Solo/Duo Queue ranked. And have a Flex Queue so that people can tryhard 5 man team on that queue. This is really annoying. Is winning really that important?
